summary: A chance meeting between a man being pressured to propose to his girlfriend and a runaway bride.
cast: Melia Kreiling|Orestes Sophocleous|Dimitris Xystras|Alexia Paraskeva|Dimitris Sacorafos|Kerry Constantinou|Erato Aristotelous|Andreas Ioannou|Spyros Kliri|Ioannis Kliris|Marios Matheou|Mo|Eftychia Neophytou|Elli R.
title: Committed
